title: Cant see my own club what can i do??
body:
So when the clubs were fixed i just cant see my own club and im the leader i appear "offline" to my friends in the club chat and they cant inv me, also i cant see the club in my clubs tab what can i do please help me i like to put the tag with friends. 
PD.hope u understand me my english sucks xD

replies.body: Saame probleem! :D riot please i as well wish to see my mates.. and my epic tag.. :) thx

> [{quoted}](name=XxkokororeaperxX,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nuz4be2E,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-01T12:13:28.752+0000)
>
> So when the clubs were fixed i just cant see my own club and im the leader i appear &quot;offline&quot; to my friends in the club chat and they cant inv me, also i cant see the club in my clubs tab what can i do please help me i like to put the tag with friends. 
> PD.hope u understand me my english sucks xD

I'm also having the same issue annoying cause I miss my club and tag.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

There's been some issues with clubs since it's been restored after some [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look at your specific issue as well as track it with our club devs.  Hopefully, we can help out!
i have same problem  :( lets hope riot is on the case :)
